Text:
Version: ZXBInstaller DVD 3.1 por fernas 2006

 El ZXBInstaller DVD 3.1 es una aplicacion compatible tanto en XBOX como en PC lo que te da una gran variedad de posibilidades para la Scene de la XBOX.

poorly translated by Google Language:

Version: ZXBInstaller DVD 3,1 by fernas 2006

ZXBInstaller DVD 3,1 is a compatible application as much in XBOX as in PC which gives a great variety you of possibilities for the Scene of the XBOX. 

Characteristic: 

1) It has a information menu that now est? divided in subcategories that serves to understand better the AutoInstaller and what installs. To part peque±o has been added dictionary to this seccion. 

2) Menu of Format:

 - Complete Format (useful for new HD).
 - Formatear Partition? (you can choose that partition to formatear). 

3) XBOX Chipeadas: Menu that contains all the necessary one for your chipeada XBOX or with the TSOP Flasheado. 

3.1) Fleshear BIOS: This option installs and executes the AutoFlash that contains the following BIOS:

 - X2.5032 (512k s?lamente)
 - EvoX M8+ (256k, 512k and 1Mb). 

3.3) ZXBPack: This opci?n installs all the necessary one of the ZXBInstaller in your XBOX including 1 Dashboard (?til for the new ones in the Scene of the XBOX). 

4) XBOX with Exploit: Men? that contains all the necessary one for your XBOX with Exploit. 

4.1) Updates: This opci?n allows you to install/to update of your UXE, UDE1 or UDE2 the PBL or NKPatcher:

 - PBL Metoo v1.4.1 (with BIOS EvoX compatible M8+ BFM with XBOX v1.0 - v1.7).
 - NKPatcher v10 (compatible with XBOX v1.0 - v1.7). 

4.3) Complete Exploit: This men? allows you to install/to update your Exploit of the following way:

 - UXE + NKPatcher v10
 - UXE + PBL Metoo v1.4.1 

Each menu gives you to choose between 5 dashboards to acompanar to the UXE of your election:

 - Dash2Gam v3.2B.
 - EvoX 3935.
 - UIX v01.03.05.
 - UnleashX 0.39.0222A.
 - XBMC 09/07/06
 - ZXBtHc LITE Mod v1.3a. 

4.4) Games: This option allows you to install the following hackeadas games (in AutoInstaller) in your XBOX:

 - 007 AUF.
 - MechAssault.
 - Splinter Cell NTSC.
 - Splinter Cell the PAL. 

4.5) Desinstalacion: Formatea option that partition C of your XBOX to eliminate the Exploit and installs the Original Dash v5960 without modificaci?n some. 

4.6) ZXBPack: Package of instalaci?n dedicated to the new ones in this of the Scene of the XBOX that is compatbible with the XBOX with Exploit. 
3.2, 4,2) Dashboards.

 - Anod-X v1.02.1

 - Original Dashboard v5960. 

5) Any XBOX: Men? that contain applications and emulators that are compatible in any XBOX (mayorøa find incluødos in the ZXBPack).

 - BiosChecker v5

 - QuakeX

6) Linux: Menu in where you can find two distributions of Linux for XBOX. 

6.1) Gentoox Home v6.0a 

6.2) sXbmini v1.0: This distribuci?n does not settle in the HD of the XBOX but that is executed from he himself DVD which you permitir? to execute some applications of Linux and to sail by Internet with no need to install nothing. 

7) Utilerøas: Men? that allows you to execute different applications from the ZXBInstaller that can help to repair some XBOX you or to obtain informaci?n of the same one.
